abstract: Students at Our Lady Queen of Angels school in East Harlem prepare for Pope Francis's visit; 24 third and fourth graders from four Catholic schools will meet with pope at East Harlem school.
lead_paragraph: Tens of thousands of New Yorkers will try to glimpse the pope, but a select group of children from four Catholic schools will get their own private audience.

headline.main: New York Students Prepare for a Special Visitor: Pope Francis
headline.print_headline: Students in Harlem Await Time With Pontiff

snippet: Tens of thousands of New Yorkers will try to glimpse the pope, but a select group of children from four Catholic schools will get their own private audience.

keywords.value: Our Lady Queen of Angels (East Harlem, NY)
